strapiJob.title: Assistant Manager
strapiJob.description:
We’re looking for someone who isn’t just a manager, but a leader. Someone who can catch our vision and motivates our team to seek excellence in serving our customers. This person should be obsessed with customer service and team leadership, and have a solid understanding of restaurant operations. Preferably, this person would also have experience with Inventory, Receiving, Merchandising, and POS Systems.

Responsibilities include:

-Assist in leading general store operations

-Promote a healthy Snack Lab culture in accordance with our “Snack Lab Guide to Success”, Mission, and Standards

-Open/Close store in accordance with operational standards

-Manage daily ordering, receiving, and inventory

-Manage daily product merchandising duties

-Operate in compliance with local and state health code

-Help manage onboarding and training of new Team Members

-Help ensure operational labor and COGS goals are met
